column2: "I'm finally getting used to this place."
"I think I've figured out which rocks are stable, too. I'm going to give it my all from here on out."
"Hey, that Dragonkin looks like he might be able to talk with us."
"Hiiiii! I've got a question for you! Is that alright?"
"〔ARKS...〕〔Go home〕〔No intention〕〔Making friends〕"
"〔Seeking something〕〔Appears〕〔However〕〔Do not cross path〕"
"This guy isn't very friendly. I wonder what we did to piss him off..."
"〔Will not〕〔Repeat again〕〔Go home〕"
"〔...Curses〕〔Meddlesome woman〕"
"Darn it, he got away. Don't slow me down, Light! Let's hurry after him."
"Oh hey, <%me>. Are you investigating the Dragonkin as well?"
"No, I guess not. The look on your face suggests you're searching for something."

"Sorry, but I don't know
anything about that. I have
no interest in relics."
"The highest member of the Ro clan might know something, if you can manage to ask her."
"But that's easier said than done. I've never been able to meet with her."
"But we need to get back to chasing this member of Ko clan."
"<%me> and friends, I'll see you all later."

"Right...
So where were we, again?"
"Dragonkin... scary... Dragonkin... scary..."
